## Licensing Compliance Confirmation

By submitting this pull request, you confirm:

- You understand the software is AGPL v3 with a mandatory LGBTQ+ Protective Use Clause.

- You are not contributing on behalf of a hedge fund, finance firm, or commercial actor.

- You will not use Aurora for commercial or profit-seeking purposes.

- All institutional benefits from Aurora must support LGBTQ+ protection or public-interest missions.
